content:
Hello, everyone! I am a PhD Student currently working on clinical data modelling and distributed machine learning with FHIR @ Maastricht University/ Maastro Clinic, Netherlands.

I am going for a short trip to the USA during the first 2 weeks of the New Year (Jan 2nd'19 until Jan 12th '19 ). Presently, I am looking for some opportunities to get in touch with some research groups in the USA working on clinical data modelling/ data science in FHIR. I would be very interested in spending a couple of days to a week learning about their work and sharing what we are doing here at Maastricht University.

Recently, at the Netherlands HL7 WGM, we demonstrated the PoC of our idea. You can follow it on github : https://github.com/jvsoest/PHT_on_FHIR_demo

Any leads from any of you will be very much appreciated. Looking forward to hearing from you :).
